name: Rosewood
description:
Rosewood is a roleplaying survival game where the player takes control of a witch who returns to a broken city ravaged by ghouls and monsters. The player's goal is to help rebuild the city by completing quests, helping the fellow townsfolk return to their homes and building the city back up to its former glory that it once was.

The witch (The player's character) Returns to a broken city and must use the tools around her to survive the night, the cold, and enemies surrounding Rosewood. She runs into the towns former blacksmith (A fox NPC) who helps to give her tasks, and by completing these tasks the player will unlock extra craftables, and also further quests and rewards to start rebuilding Rosewood back up to once was.

Controls

WASD - Move
Space - Attack Trees/Rocks/Enemies
Q - Open Quest Menu
I - Open Inventory (When Unlocked)
C - Open Crafting (When Unlocked)
F - (Collect Item/Talk to NPC/Open Chest/Enter Tent)
R - Revive when dead

Scroll Wheel - Change Current Items

    Mouse 
    Crafting:
                 -Hover over crafting item to see the recipe
                 -Click to craft if the player has enough of that item

    Inventory/Chest:
                 -Clicking on Item in hotbar sends it into the chest/inventory
                 -Clicking on the item in the inventory sends it into your hotbar
                 -Clicking on the item in the chest sends it into your hotbar/inventory

    Dialogue:
                 -Click Feather Pen Icon to go to next dialogue
